short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Research professional contact details from LinkedIn profiles, including emails, direct dials, and social media profiles.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
WHAT IS DATAGMA?

Datagma is a chrome extension that lives alongside your main browser window within LinkedIn, your email, CRM and Company Websites in order to provide you with deep research on companies and contacts, while providing you with their email addresses and phone numbers with just a click. Additionally, you can use advanced functionality beyond the extension by signing in at datagma.com

HOW DOES IT WORK?

Prospect from LinkedIn - Click on our chrome extension, and then navigate to any LinkedIn profile or search resul  in order to start seeing extra information on each prospect and begin uncovering email addresses and phone numbers.
